translation.en: LAMECH: From Adam to Seth, from Seth to Enosh,
translation.ja: そのセトの最後の末裔(まつえい)が 今―アダムからセトセトからエノシュへ アダムからセトセトからエノシュへ アダムからセトセトからエノシュへ成年に達しようとしてた 成年に達しようとしてた

translation.en: Enosh to Kenan, Kenan to Mahalalel
translation.ja: 成年に達しようとしてたエノシュからケナンケナンからマハラルエル エノシュからケナンケナンからマハラルエル

translation.en: to my father, Methuselah, then to me.
translation.ja: その次に生まれたのが私の父 メトシェラだ

translation.en: Today, that birthright passes to you,
translation.ja: 私の次の血筋が お前だ

translation.en: The Creator made Adam in His image,
translation.ja: 神は自らをかたどってアダムを創り―

translation.en: and then placed the world in his care.
This is your work now. Your responsibility.
translation.ja: 子孫のお前はその仕事を引き継ぐのだ

translation.en: May you walk alongside The Creator in righteousness.
translation.ja: 神と共に常に正しい道を歩め

translation.en: YOUNG TUBAL-CAIN: The Shrine of Seth!
The ground is rich with tzohar.
This is The Creator's land. What are you doing?
translation.ja: 神の土地で何をしてる

translation.en: My mines run dry. My city withers and must be fed.
translation.ja: 俺たちの鉱脈は枯れ尽き民は飢えにあえいでる

translation.en: He cursed us to struggle by the sweat of our brow to survive!
translation.ja: “額(ひたい)に汗して生き抜け”と突き放した

translation.en: Damned if I don't do everything it takes to do just that.
translation.ja: だから生き抜くためにこうするんだ

translation.en: Damned if I don't take what I want.
translation.ja: 欲しいものは自分で手に入れる

translation.en: This relic belongs to the descendants of Cain now.
translation.ja: ここはカインの子孫のもの

translation.en: The line of Seth ends here.

translation.ja: 俺たちの土地だ　掘れ！

translation.en: How they're attached to the ground? That's where they should be.
translation.ja: 大地に根を下ろして咲く

translation.en: They have a purpose. They sprout.
translation.ja: 目的があって新芽を出し―

translation.en: And they bloom. The wind takes their seeds and more flowers grow.
translation.ja: 花が咲き 風が種を運びまた花が咲く

translation.en: We only collect what we can use, and what we need.

translation.ja: 奴らが来る　早く隠れろ

translation.en: POACHER: You found our kill. (GASPS) How fortunate.
translation.ja: それは俺たちの獲物だ

translation.en: You know how long it is since we ate meat?
Since we even saw an animal?

translation.ja: 助けてくれ　何が望みだ？

translation.en: They think it makes them stronger.
They forget strength comes from The Creator.
translation.ja: 強さは神が与えてくださるものだ
興味津々(しんしん)だった

translation.en: He had to see it sometime.
Perhaps He will finally make things right.
translation.ja: 神が世を正(ただ)してくださるのよ

translation.en: NAAMEH: Did He speak to you?
He's going to destroy the world.
NAAMEH: It's a long and dangerous journey for the boys. (BABY COOING)
translation.ja: 子供たちには つらい旅よ

translation.en: How do you know your grandfather's still alive?
translation.ja: お祖父さまはまだこの世に？

translation.en: NOAH: I don't. I saw his mountain.
translation.ja: 分からない　だが山を見た

translation.en: We need to go and find out if he knows what we're to do.
translation.ja: どうすべきかを尋ねたい

translation.en: YOUNG HAM: Shem. Can you help me with this?
We could take the boys and find a place to hide.
translation.ja: どこかに隠れ住んだら？

translation.en: NOAH: Ham, let me show you how to do that.
Push it in here. Next time we come through, we'll know we've got certain things we might need.
translation.ja: ここに埋めておけば必要な物を取り戻せる

translation.en: NOAH: We will not get too close.
YOUNG HAM: Is that a tzohar mine?
NOAH: It was once. Before they dug it all up.
Do you think they're all dead?
It looks that way. They must have been scavenging here.
translation.ja: そのようね残り物をあさってて…
イラよ　あたしの名はイラ

translation.en: You're going to be all right, Ila.
He's going to hold your hand tight and he won't let go.
translation.ja: あなたの手を握ってるわ

translation.en: MAN: Up the hill! Hurry! Hurry!
translation.ja: こっちだ！　早く来い！
奴らが来る　行こう

translation.en: NOAH: We have no choice. Hurry!
translation.ja: 登るしかない　急げ！

translation.en: Protect your mother, first and last.

translation.ja: ノア　しっかりして

translation.en: We are to see Methuselah. My grandfather.
translation.ja: 祖父のメトシェラに会いたい

translation.en: A child of the old one?
Do you forget how they betrayed The Creator?
translation.ja: 神を裏切った人間の１人だ

translation.en: It is He who sends us!

translation.ja: ここで朽(く)ち果てて死ね

translation.en: I want my daddy to sing to me.
translation.ja: 父さんの歌を聞きたい

translation.en: You know, I, too, lost my father when I was very young.
translation.ja: 私の父も早く死んだが―

translation.en: There's a song he used to sing me sometimes when I couldn't sleep.
translation.ja: 眠れない時には この歌を

translation.en: Would you like to hear it?

translation.ja: お前の帰りを　　父さんが待ってる

translation.en: ♪ To wrap you in His sheltering wings
translation.ja: 雨風を防ぐ翼で　　お前を包み込み―
“ゆっくり お休み”と　　　 優しく ささやく
心を癒やす風 “ゆっくり お休み”と　　　 優しく ささやく
“ゆっくり お休み”と　　　 優しく ささやく
“ゆっくり お休み”と　　　 優しく ささやく
もう 子を産めない

translation.en: If the fever doesn't take her,
Watchers have learned to fear men.
translation.ja: 我らは人間を恐れてる

translation.en: YOUNG HAM: Then why are you helping us?
The Creator formed us on the second day.
translation.ja: 神は天地創造二日目に我らを創った

translation.en: The day He made the heavens.
We watched over Adam and Eve.
translation.ja: 我らはアダムとイブの―

translation.en: Saw their frailty and their love.
translation.ja: 愛の姿と弱さを目にし― 哀れにも楽園から追われるのを見た

translation.en: And then we saw their fall. And we pitied them.
translation.ja: 哀れにも楽園から追われるのを見た

translation.en: We were not stone then, but light.
translation.ja: その頃の我らは石でなく光だった

translation.en: It was not our place to interfere.
translation.ja: 我らは神を差し置いて―

translation.en: Yet we chose to try and help mankind.
translation.ja: 人間を助けようとした 神の御(み)心に背いた我らを―

translation.en: And when we disobeyed The Creator,
translation.ja: 神の御(み)心に背いた我らを―

translation.en: We were encrusted by your world.
Rock and mud shackled our fiery glow.
translation.ja: 我らの輝きは奪われた

translation.en: Still, we taught mankind all we knew of Creation.
translation.ja: それでも人間に神の創造の力を教えた
我らの助けで― 人間は塵から立ち上がり偉大になった

translation.en: they rose from the dust, became great and mighty.
translation.ja: 人間は塵から立ち上がり偉大になった

translation.en: But then they turned our gifts to violence.
translation.ja: だが奴らは その知識を暴力に向けた

translation.en: Only one man protected us. Your grandfather Methuselah. (SOLDIERS SHOUTING)
translation.ja: 唯一 味方に立ったのがお前の祖父だ

translation.en: We were hunted. Most of us killed.
translation.ja: 我らは追われほとんどが殺された

translation.en: Those who lived were left prisoners in these stony shells,
translation.ja: 生き残った者は泥の塊に閉じ込められ―
不毛の地に とり残された 神に助けを求めたが―

translation.en: We begged The Creator to take us home.

translation.ja: 沈黙しか戻らなかった

translation.en: you claim that you have heard His call.
translation.ja: 神の声を聞いたと言う

translation.en: Samyaza cannot accept this. A man?
translation.ja: シェムハザはそれを信じない

translation.en: When it is men who broke the world.

translation.ja: だが私は お前の中に―

translation.en: and I see a glimmer of Adam again.
translation.ja: アダムの面影を見て取れる

translation.en: The man I came to help.
YOUNG HAM: Why can't I come?
Because I need you to look after Mother.
(WHISPERING) And you look after your father.
This is your great-grandfather. Show him respect.
translation.ja: お前の曾(ひい)祖父さんだ挨拶を

translation.en: I think you must have your mother's looks, not your father's.
translation.ja: 父親に似ず母親似のようだ

translation.en: what do you like most in the world?
What can compete with fresh, ripe berries? Nothing.
translation.ja: よく熟(う)れた野イチゴはうまい

translation.en: Yes, it's been so long I can barely remember the taste of them.
translation.ja: ずっと食べておらんので味を忘れた

translation.en: Ah, tell me, did you bring me any?
You must be tired. It's a long way up here.
What we need to discuss is not for boys.
translation.ja: これからの話は子供に聞かせたくない

translation.en: Before he walked on, my father Enoch told me that one day,
translation.ja: 父エノクは死ぬ前に言った“人間が その行いを―”

translation.en: if man continued in his ways,
The Creator would annihilate this world.
So what I saw is true?
All life blotted out because of what man has done?
translation.ja: 人間のせいで世界が消える
避けることは？ 神の言葉はいつも正しく明快だ

translation.en: Noah, you must trust that He speaks in a way that you can understand.
translation.ja: 神の言葉はいつも正しく明快だ

translation.en: Why send me if there's nothing I can do to stop it?
translation.ja: 神は なぜ私をここに？

translation.en: Well, perhaps He simply sends you here to share a cup of tea with an old man.
translation.ja: 老人の茶飲み相手によこしたのさ

translation.en: So, is that all you saw? The fires of destruction on this place?
translation.ja: この世が火で焼き尽くされるのを見たのか

translation.en: My father said it would be fire.
I saw water. Death by water.
translation.ja: 水です　全てが溺れて死んだ

translation.en: Something I'm to do. I know it.
translation.ja: 私が これから行うべきことを

translation.en: I just didn't see what it was.
Well, perhaps there is more for you to see.
translation.ja: お前は まだ多くを見る

translation.en: Did He not send you here to drink a cup of tea with an old man?
translation.ja: 老人の茶飲み相手ではないようだ
薬草茶は まずいしな

translation.en: YOUNG SHEM: She was the only one moving.
YOUNG SHEM: She had a big cut on her belly. Mother helped and I held her hand.
translation.ja: お腹に大きな傷が…母さんが命を助けたんだ

translation.en: That must have made her feel safe.
It separates the foul from the pure. The wicked from the innocent.
translation.ja: 悪に汚(けが)れたものと清らかなものを分ける

translation.en: And that which sinks from that which rises.
translation.ja: 底に沈むもの水面に浮き上がるもの

translation.en: He chose you for a reason.
translation.ja: 神は お前を選んだのだ

translation.en: (YOUNG HAM LAUGHING) OG: Oh... YOUNG HAM: You can't get me!
He's helped me see what we're here to do.
translation.ja: そして道を示してくれた

translation.en: Men are going to be punished for what they've done to this world.
translation.ja: 悪に染まった人間に罰が下り―

translation.en: And our family has been chosen for a great task.
translation.ja: 私たち家族は大きな使命を負わされた

translation.en: We've been chosen to save the innocent.
translation.ja: 汚れなきものを救うのだ

translation.en: Because they still live as they did in the Garden.
translation.ja: 動物は汚れを知らないわ

translation.en: And we need to save enough of them to start again.
translation.ja: できるだけ多くの動物を救う

translation.en: I guess we get to start again, too.
translation.ja: 新しい暮らしが始まる

translation.en: We get to start again in a new and better world.
translation.ja: より良い 新しい世界でね

translation.en: NOAH: A great flood is coming.
The waters of the heavens will meet the waters of the earth.
translation.ja: 天の水が地の水と一緒になるのだ

translation.en: We build a vessel to survive the storm.
translation.ja: 洪水を乗り切る船を造る

translation.en: OG: He is a child of the old one!
translation.ja: ノアは あの老人の血筋だ！

translation.en: There is work to do. Help us.
Help you? (GROANS) We tried to help your kind once.
translation.ja: 手伝えだと？　一度お前らに手を貸して―

translation.en: And we lost everything because of you!
translation.ja: 我らは全てを失ったんだぞ

translation.en: We can save what is left. We can serve Him again.
translation.ja: 残ってるものもあるそれを救うんだ
この男を助けてやろう
彼は まだ独り身よ

translation.en: See, that's a boy one and that's a girl one.
After the storm, they'll become a mother and a father.
translation.ja: 嵐が過ぎると子供が生まれ―

translation.en: And the hatchlings will spread right across the world.
translation.ja: あちこちに飛び去ってく

translation.en: We have to be gentle with them
translation.ja: だから いつも優しく―

translation.en: and we have to be protective.
If something were to happen, that would be a small piece of Creation lost forever.
translation.ja: 神の御業を残すためにもね

translation.en: All of these innocent creatures are now in our care.
It's our job to look after them.
You have Mother, Shem has Ila.
translation.ja: 父さんと母さんセムとイラ
独りだ 神は箱舟を造る木材や―

translation.en: Did you see how He made the forest to give us wood for the ark?
translation.ja: 神は箱舟を造る木材や―

translation.en: hasn't He sent everything we need?
All that creeps, all that crawls,
translation.ja: 地を滑り這いずって動くもの
きれいな森ね だから鳥が来るのよ

translation.en: No one will hurt this boy.
translation.ja: この子に手を出すなよ

translation.en: My father says there can be no king in The Creator's garden.
translation.ja: 父さんは“神の園に王はいない”と

translation.en: Do not take my best soldier.
Look at his hand on that weapon. I believe he is something of mine.
translation.ja: 武器を手にしてるぞ俺の兵だ

translation.en: No, he gave it to me.
When I heard talk of miracles, I dismissed them.
translation.ja: 奇跡の噂など信じなかったが― 鳥がここに集まるのを見てこの目で確かめに来た

translation.en: But then I saw the birds with my own eyes, flying here, and I had to come.
translation.ja: 鳥がここに集まるのを見てこの目で確かめに来た

translation.en: There isn't anything for you here.
This all belongs to me. This land. This forest.
translation.ja: ここは全て俺のものだこの土地も この森も
そこの“木の砦(とりで)”も

translation.en: Did you really think you could protect yourself from me in that?
translation.ja: あそこで俺と戦うつもりか？

translation.en: to hold the innocent when The Creator sends
translation.ja: 神の洪水から汚れなきものを救う

translation.en: his deluge to wipe out the wicked from this world.
translation.ja: 神の洪水から汚れなきものを救う 神は沈黙を続け人間のことなど見捨てている

translation.en: The Creator does not care what happens in this world. Nobody has heard from Him since He marked Cain.
translation.ja: 神は沈黙を続け人間のことなど見捨てている
俺たちは地上に打ち捨てられ―

translation.en: to struggle by the sweat of our brow to survive.
translation.ja: 額に汗して生き抜いてる

translation.en: Damned if I don't do everything it takes to do just that. (SPITS)
translation.ja: だから生き抜くためにこうして―

translation.en: BOTH: Damned if I don't take what I want.
I am the son of Lamech!

translation.ja: セトの八代目の子孫だ

translation.en: Return to your cities of Cain!
Know we have all been judged!
I have men at my back, and you stand alone and defy me?
translation.ja: 大軍を率いる俺に独りで立ち向かうのか？

translation.en: His minions, uh, they're with you?

translation.ja: 奇跡だと？ 洪水が起こる？

translation.en: Perhaps casting us out of Paradise was not enough. Perhaps,
translation.ja: 神は人間を楽園から追放しただけでなく―

translation.en: He returns to finish us off.
Well, if He does, I will ride the storm in that ship of yours.
translation.ja: そういうことなら俺もお前の船で嵐を乗り切ろう

translation.en: There is no escape for you and your kind.
translation.ja: お前らに逃げ場はない

translation.en: The land is dying. NOAH: Ham. TUBAL-CAIN: The cities are dead.
translation.ja: 大地は枯れ 町は死んだ

translation.en: I'm not afraid of miracles, son of Lamech!
translation.ja: 奇跡など恐れるものか

translation.en: If you refuse my dozens now,
translation.ja: 俺たちを退(しりぞ)けるなら―
大軍で襲い返してやる！

translation.en: We need to finish as fast as we can.
The sooner He sends the rain, the better.
We build. First weapons, then men.
translation.ja: まず武器を作り強力な軍を整える

translation.en: Feed only those that will fight.
train them, and there is nothing they can't do.
translation.ja: 勇猛果敢な兵に鍛えぬく

translation.en: With an army, we can crush those giants.
translation.ja: あんな巨人ども蹴散らしてやる

translation.en: MAN 2: Give us meat. MAN 1: Our children are starving. MAN 3: Please help us!
Do you think those men are going to attack us?
What do you think it'll be like?
translation.ja: そして どうなるの？

translation.en: I'm not sure there are words.
translation.ja: 言葉にできない光景となる
悩みでも？ セムは お前を愛してる

translation.en: Whatever he's done or said, Shem is very fond of you.
translation.ja: セムは お前を愛してる

translation.en: I can't give any of that to him.
And I'm not going to deny him those things, even if he wants me to.
translation.ja: 彼が それでいいと言っても私は従えない

translation.en: why would The Creator want a barren girl on His ark?
translation.ja: 子を産めない女が箱舟に？

translation.en: When we first took you in,
I thought you were going to be a burden.
And I didn't want to see anybody else ruined by this world.
translation.ja: 傷を負った子はもう十分だと
大切な宝物だ それを忘れないように

translation.en: Just don't forget how precious a gift you are.
translation.ja: それを忘れないように

translation.en: I know you'll be going to find wives for Ham and Japheth.
translation.ja: いずれハムもヤフェトも結婚する

translation.en: You should find one for Shem, too.
MEAN UNCLE: Where do you think you're going?
WOMAN: Please, please don't take my baby!
translation.ja: やめて　私の赤ん坊よ
お願い　私に返して 黙れ　食い物に替える
黙れ　食い物に替える

translation.en: Don't take my baby! No, no, please will you stop him?
translation.ja: 誰か止めて！　私の子供よ！

translation.en: MEAN UNCLE: Quit struggling! It'll be easier.
MAN: I have two girls! I have two girls to trade!
translation.ja: 娘っ子を２人 買わないか？

translation.en: Take the girls! Give me the meat! Give it to me! (GIRLS SCREAMING)
NOAH: All of this should be inside by now.
What about our wives? Where are they?
Did you not hear what I just said?
What? What? No! You said that The Creator would give us what we'll need.
translation.ja: 神は望むものをくれるんだろう？
手伝え ひどいよ　僕はどうやって男になるんだ？

translation.en: Listen, you can't do this! You can't. How am I supposed to be a man?
translation.ja: ひどいよ　僕はどうやって男になるんだ？

translation.en: You want me to stay a child!
I'm asking you to be a man and do what needs to be done.
translation.ja: やるべきことをやれそれが男ってものだ

translation.en: NAAMEH: What are you doing, Noah?
The wickedness is not just in them.
There's goodness in us. Look at our boys.
translation.ja: 人は善も持っているわ息子たちを見て
誠実なセム優しいヤフェト
皆 いい父親になる
セムは肉体の歓びだけ

translation.en: And Japheth lives only to please. I am no better.
translation.ja: ヤフェトは好き勝手私も同じだ

translation.en: Is there anything you would not do, good or bad, for those three boys?
translation.ja: 子供たちのためなら何でもするだろ？

translation.en: We would both choose to kill
in order to protect our children.
We were weak and we were selfish to think we could set ourselves apart.
translation.ja: 弱くて身勝手な人間だ

translation.en: We will work, complete the task,
translation.ja: 一生懸命 働いて役目を果たし―
私たちの子供よ　ノア！

translation.en: The time for mercy has passed.
METHUSELAH: Did you bring me something?
Did Noah plant the seed I gave him?
Mmm. And in all that forest there were no berries?
translation.ja: 野イチゴが実ったかな？

translation.en: Then why did you come here?
He leaves our boys with no one.
translation.ja: 息子たちは皆 独り

translation.en: Shem has Ila, but she's barren.
There'll be no other wives, so
The Creator destroys this world because we corrupted it.
translation.ja: 神は汚れた この世を滅ぼし―

translation.en: So we ourselves must be destroyed.
translation.ja: 人間は自らを― 滅ぼす

translation.en: Not when I look at my sons.
Isn't that all their hearts need to be good?
translation.ja: 心が善だという証しですわ

translation.en: METHUSELAH: Who is good? Who is wicked?
translation.ja: 誰が善で 誰が悪なのか

translation.en: How am I supposed to know what is right?
translation.ja: 一体 何が正しいのか それはノアがなすべき選択だ

translation.en: That choice is Noah's. Not mine. Not yours.
translation.ja: それはノアがなすべき選択だ

translation.en: It sounds like he has made it.
So then you will not help me?
I don't know if I even could.
But if I tried, it could cause pain
translation.ja: 助けても苦しみが訪れ―
悲劇になるだろう 最後は全てがノアに覆いかぶさる

translation.en: And in the end, it would just come back to Noah again.
translation.ja: 最後は全てがノアに覆いかぶさる

translation.en: I want my sons to have children. I want them to be happy.
translation.ja: 息子たちが子を持ち幸せになれば…

translation.en: I can't bear to think of them dying alone.
translation.ja: 孤独な死は むごすぎます

translation.en: SOLDIER: Out of the way! Coming through!
It's all right. It's all right. I'm not... I'm not going to hurt you.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　何もしないよ
